price: Ka ce: "Ubangijĩna ba Ya kula da ku in bã dõmin addu'arku* ba. To, lalle ne, kun ƙaryata, sabõda haka al'amarin zã ya zama malizimci."
arabic: قُلۡ مَا يَعۡبَؤُاْ بِكُمۡ رَبِّي لَوۡلَا دُعَآؤُكُمۡۖ فَقَدۡ كَذَّبۡتُمۡ فَسَوۡفَ يَكُونُ لِزَامَۢا
footnotes: * Wannan yanã nũna cewa Allah Yanã son bãyinSa mãsu rõƙonsa. Kuma Yanã son a rõkeShi ƙwarai.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul mā yaʿba-u bikum rabbī lawlā duʿāukum faqad kadhabtum fasawfa yakūnu lizāman
